EraScore.title: Threatening Camp Destroyed
EraScore.description: A hostile barbarian camp within 6 tiles of one of your cities was destroyed by a unit.

EraScore.title: Barbarian Camp Destroyed
EraScore.description: A hostile barbarian camp was leveled to the ground by a unit, spreading peace through the area.

EraScore.title: First Civic Completed
EraScore.description: You completed your first civic.

EraScore.description: You completed your first technology.

EraScore.description: You established your first government.

EraScore.title: First Great Person Earned
EraScore.description: You earned your first Great Person.

EraScore.title: First City Founded on a New Continent
EraScore.description: You founded a city on a continent other than your home continent.

EraScore.title: First City-State Met
EraScore.description: You met your first city-state.

EraScore.title: First Major Civilization Met
EraScore.description: You met another major civilization for the first time.

EraScore.title: Natural Wonder Discovered
EraScore.description: You discovered a natural wonder.

EraScore.title: First Religion Founded
EraScore.description: You founded a religion.

EraScore.title: First City Converted to Religion
EraScore.description: You converted a city to your religion for the first time.

EraScore.title: First Wonder Built
EraScore.description: You built your first world wonder.

EraScore.description: You built your first district.

EraScore.title: First Unique Unit Trained

EraScore.title: First Unique Building Constructed
EraScore.description: You constructed your first unique building.

EraScore.title: First Unique Improvement Built
EraScore.description: You built your first unique improvement.

EraScore.title: First City Population 10
EraScore.description: A city you own reached a population of 10 for the first time.

EraScore.title: First City Population 20
EraScore.description: A city you own reached a population of 20 for the first time.

EraScore.title: First Tier 3 Government Established

EraScore.description: You built your first Spaceport district.
